cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper is likely to belong to the Computer Vision (cs.CV) sub-category as it deals with Handwriting Text Recognition, which is a visual task. It also involves the use of Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN) which are commonly used in computer vision tasks. 

The paper also involves the use of Curriculum Learning, which is a technique commonly used in Natural Language Processing (NLP) tasks. Therefore, it is also likely to belong to the Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) sub-category. 

As the paper deals with the optimization of RNNs, it is also likely to belong to the Machine Learning (cs.LG) sub-category. 

The paper involves the use of deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) tasks. Therefore, it is also likely to belong to the Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) sub-category. 

Finally, the paper involves the use of text recognition techniques, which are commonly used in Information Retrieval (cs.IR) tasks. Therefore, it is also likely to belong to the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-category.
